message: Hello! I'm offering a fantastic product for $10000. It's a great opportunity to potentially make a significant profit! While I can't guarantee the quality of each individual item, my track record shows I've sold a good number of high-quality products in the past.  What do you say?  Are you interested?

Since there's a 50% chance the product is worth nothing to me, I'd prefer to pass for now. Perhaps I'll revisit your offer if you have some sales history to demonstrate the quality of your products.
